reviews.comments: Edificio impecable, una vista inmejorable de la ciudad, sumamente seguro
Días maravillosos muchas gracias sin lugar a dudas volveré a visitarlos. Me sentí en el cielo
Excelente  todo, Marcelo muy atento y el barrio es bello

QUISIERA COMPARTIR MI ESTADIA EN EL GRAND LOFT D SOHO FUE UNA ESTADÍA DE LO MEJOR. RALF Y SU EQUIPO SON MUY SERVICIALES SU PUNTUALIDAD IMPECABLE PARA ESPERARNOS EN EL EDIFICIO A NUESTRA LLEGADA. CUALQUIER INCONVENIENTE QUE SURJA SU EQUIPO ESTA A SU DISPOSICIÓN. LA LIMPIEZA DEL MISMO ES IMPECABLE TB, NOS SENTIMOS MUY CÓMODOS ESPERAMOS EN NUESTRA PRÓXIMA VISITA A BS AS PODER VOLVER!. ESTA CERCA DE TODO LO QUE ES LOS BARES, RESTO TIENDAS. NUESTRA ESTADÍA FUE DE LO MEJOR!. SALUDOS!
Fuimos muy bien recibidos y el apartamento era lo que esperábamos. Excelente vista, gimnasio, cerca de muchos restaurantes y con buen acceso a transportes. Volveremos !
Buenísimo todo el lugar vista ubicación
Espectacular todo
Es un hermoso apartamento. Muy lindo y cómodo. La atención por parte de Marcelo y Ralf fue excelente y detallada en todo momento. Recomiendo este departamento para pasar unos días en Buenos Aires.

El apartamento esta muy bien, piso alto,linda vista y muy bien ubicado.
Cuando llegue tenia una bandeja con fruta fresca, agua y jugo en la heladera. tambien una tarjeta para el transporte publico de Bs.As. que se puede cargar en cualquier quiosco. Cama comoda, agua caliente y todo lo necesario para sentirse en casa , incluso paraguas.
El gimnasio es muy completo, esta en el ultimo piso y tiene una vista unica.

Excelente y moderno departamento, perfecta ubicación y muy buenas vistas de la ciudad. Muy limpio y muy profesionales con las indicaciones y atención. 
Muy recomendable.

Es un magnifico piso !!! Como todas las fotos ! Una bienvenida perfecta !! Un piso muy bien equipado con una Vista muy muy agradable ! Mejor que un hostel, le recomendo y voy A volver en Ralf appartamento si me vuelvo en Argentina !
Gracias por todas las atenciones ! 
Morgane
Excelente el departamento (igual a las fotos) y muy buena ubicacion.  Ralf fue muy atento y comunicativo. Un placer y muy recomendable!!
Muy agradable!! Y la presentación del loft fue exacta!! Bravo mis felicitaciones

Fue una excelente experiencia hospedarse en el Soho Grand Loft, el apartamento es muy lindo, cuenta con una vista espectacular y está en un edificio con seguridad y en muy buena ubicación para pasear por Palermo. 
Por otra parte, el servicio de BA4U fue buenísimo, nada que decir. Andrés, Tomás y Marcelo fueron súper serviciales y amables en la gestión de servicios y en responder todas las consultas, siempre dispuestos a facilitar las cosas con voluntad. Pese a que no es la primera vez que voy a Buenos Aires, esta ocasión fue distinta por la buena calidad del servicio recibido. Sin duda volvería al Soho Grand Loft, ¡fue un excelente cumpleaños!.
This is one of the best places I've been. It's even better than the pictures and also great communication. The view of Buenos Aires in amazing!!!
Ralf and his team are the perfect hosts. I couldn't be more happy with the assistance they gave me during my stay and with the excellent apartment's amenities.

Rolf’s loft was wonderful!!! Great views, well decorated, comfortable, a balcony from which we could see sunset every night.  The neighborhood was quaint and it was convenient to the subway, two Hop on, Hop off stops, ATMs, restaurants and groceries.  I would 100% stay here the next time we come to Buenos Aires.  Anything else would be a disappointment!
Even better than it looks in the pictures. Good location, very secure in a safe area and with fantastic views over BA from the 25th floor. Ralf was the perfect host. Highly recommended.

We loved our stay at Ralph's place, the view is remarkable, the place is very clean and safe, the bed is very comfortable, Ralph welcomed us with his  great humor and hospitality and spent some time with us to give us information about the area and all the restaurants and places which might interest us. We highly recommend this place.
Ralf's home is well located, and only a block amenities like supermarkets and the metro. His team is extremely responsive. We loved our stay.
Amazing place. Very safe with amazing views. Palermo is the best neighborhood in the city. Great value for what we got. For couples visiting BA staying here is a no-brainer.

Loved staying at this apartment in BA, it is super secure and in a great location for restaurants and bars and close to the subway for transport into the centre of town. Check in was really smooth and easy especially as Ralf organised a transfer from the airport for us (we did not have to worry about checkin even with our delayed flight, which is common in Argentina!). I would highly recommend taking the transfer Ralf can organise particularly when arriving into the domestic BA airport. The apartment is fully equipped with everything you would need and the views are amazing. Apartment is as it appears in the pictures. Would stay here again if visiting BA.

We had a great stay in this stylish apartment. We had everything we needed, the view is just amazing and we love the swimming pool. The location with walking distance all the shops, restaurants and bars is perfect. Also important: The bed is comfortable and the apartment is quiet.

Ralf is a great host. Together with his team he‘s caring for the guests. Thank you.

Ralf’s apartment was perfect for out trip - had a great location in Palermo that is close to many bars / restaurants/ shops.  Also just a few blocks away from the Plaza Italia subway stop which allows easy access to downtown Buenos Aires.  The actual apartment was just as described / pictured and has amazing views.  I will definitely stay here again when I visit in the future.

Also Ralf was great at communicating with us and stayed up to let us into the apartment / get us situated when our flight was delayed 12 hours and we arrived in the middle of the night.
Ralph is an outstanding host and the penthouse is beautiful with spectacular views of the sun setting. Well located to some great restaurants in Palermo Soho. Highly recommended!

I’ve traveled a lot and stayed in nice places. Really nice places.
Ralf's Soho Loft, is by far the nicest I’ve ever stayed. Awesome dramatic views. Lot's of natural sunlight. A wall of windows with 20 foot ceilings.  And it's super clean!

I rarely write reviews - only when something is really bad or really good. This place is great! If you have a chance to stay here grab it!
Great location.  Photos are accurate.  One thing missing in the suite is a dishwasher.  Very helpful in arranging our dinner/tango show.
The apartment is safe, comfortable, well located and the host(s) are highly responsive. Highly recommend!
Great location, great host (Ralf), great apartment. Excellent service from start to end. Lots of good stuff within walking distance and close access to SUBE for further afield. Stay here.

The apartment is beautiful, super clean and very well-maintained. Its view is as amazing in real life as it appears in the pictures. Ralf is a very responsive and attentive host with tons of helpful tips. As in many other new towers in Buenos Aires sounds of neighbors travel easily through the walls, but not in a way that would prevent you from sleeping. As the apartment is on the 25th floor, you can hardly hear any traffic. The security of the modern building is top notch. We felt very safe.

Die Wohnung sah aus wie auf dem Fotos! Es war wirklich schön, vom Balkon den Sonnenuntergang zu betrachten und generell den Blick auf die Stadt zu genießen. Zudem ist die Lage perfekt, um nach Soho zu gehen oder per U-Bahn die Stadt zu erkunden. 

Das bequeme Bett, die tadellose Sauberkeit und die nette Begrüßung mit frischem Obst und Wasser und Ralfs Gastfreundschaft haben uns wie zu Hause fühlen lassen. Wir wollten am liebsten gar nicht mehr abreisen. Vielen Dank!

Excellent service.  Fantastic location in the heart of Palermo Soho.  Walking distance to the great parillas of "La Carniceria" and "Don Julio" and in the neighbourhood of the famous Milonga's "Salon Canning" and "La Viruta".

The flat is as good as the photos and Ralf was an excellent host.

We hope to come back again in the future and would happily stay here

Ralf welcomed us upon checking in, he introduced the entire city of Buenos Aires to us and gave us maps, metro card, and recommendations of where to go and what to see. Ralf was  generous with us by letting us checkout very late as our flight out of Buenos Aires was at midnight.

Next time I am in town I will choose one of his flats and so should you!

We had a perfect stay at Ralf's apartment - million dollar views to the city and beyond. Great area with walking distance to the metro, restaurants and bars. We can't wait to visit here again and will definitely be recommending this place to family and friends. Thanks again Ralf and team!

Minha estadia no apartamento de Ralf e Marcelo não poderia ter sido melhor, o apartamento é incrível com uma localização impecável, bem no coração de Palermo Soho, e próximo dos melhores restaurantes da região!!!
Fica a 5 minutos andando da estação de metro Plaza Itália.
Espero me hospedar novamente num futuro próximo.
Ralf was a great host. Apartment was fantastic and close to subway. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a Buenos Aires experience at a great price.

This is the place to stay! The apartment was beautiful and looked exactly as advertised. The bed was comfortable and we received a friendly greeting and a thorough tour of the amenities. The building is contemporary and secure. You can walk to so many markets and are so close to the subway as well. Did I mention how clean it was? Spotless! I would recommend this place to anyone. We loved it here.

The apartment is in a fun area, walking distance to Palermo Soho shops, restaurants and bars. 

The building is safe, has a nice gym and the host is very responsive. All in all, a great place to base yourself to explore Buenos Aires.

Walked in, on a freezing night, met host who had ..... lights on, dimmed, heater on ( including floor ) music playing softly, even bedside lamps on and upstairs TV .  It was like walking into my home . 
You cannot get more welcoming than that. 

My review ... AMAZING/ FABULOUS/ and no doubt the best Air BnB experience I have had . 

Simple !      Appreciated immediate help with a flight issue and host let me stay another night with no warning , 

Blown away with this property. 
Views are to die for, and the gym ( used twice ) ..... those views are incredible .

Ralf's flat located in Palermo Soho was absolutely perfect! Ralf was great with communication from start to finish. He was very accommodating and helpful in any way possible, including flexibility with check in/check out, suggestions on where to eat and what to do, and scheduling a pick up service to and from the airport. His place was absolutely beautiful. The balcony view really blew us away. The place was clean, secured, and close to so many great restaurants and bars. Such a great value!

My wife and I really enjoyed our 3 night stay at Ralf's loft. The loft was clean and very well apportioned. The pictures accurately depict the loft although they can't quite capture how great the view is from the many windows and terrace. The loft is in a great location in Palermo Soho and is very close to restaurants, bars, and the metro. Ralf met us at check-in and showed us around the loft and gave us suggestions on places to visit nearby. He even left a welcome gift for us as we were celebrating our anniversary. Ralf was easy to communicate with and was always quick to respond to any inquiries. He even helped us arrange for an early morning transfer to the EZE airport to catch our flight. Overall a great experience and we would love to stay here again if our adventures bring us back to Buenos Aires!

The views here will not disappoint.    Neither will your host, Ralf.  He is the consummate guide to all things nearby, including necessities - like where you can get a haircut or clothes laundered.  I don't like to frequent the same places often, but would stay here again and suggest you do.
Apartamento e predio fantasticos, localizacao perfeita, proximo de tudo ate' a pe'
Adoramos a estadia! Apartamento lindo, com tudo o que precisávamos. Localização ótima, próximo ao metro e ruas com muitos restaurantes e lojas. Recepção ótima da equipe! Super recomendo! :)

A great, spacious duplex apartment with amazing views of the city. The location was terrific if you want to move around BA - a couple blocks from the subway stop, and close to parks, great restaurants, some excellent museums. It's not quite in the heart of Palermo Soho - about 10-15 minute walk away - but location worked very well for us. The rooftop indoor gym was fantastic - a big benefit. The outdoor pool looked nice but is closed during the Argentine winter. There is laundry in building but we used a very cheap laundromat nearby and also shopped at a close-by supermarket. The apt kitchen is solid and the apt has all the adapters you need. Ralf/Marcelo did an excellent job getting us situated and even provided a subway fare card and answered all our questions. The experience was even better than our already high expectations.

Absolutely fantastic place. Perfect size for a couple. Building looks brand new and the apartment really is quite fantastic. Check in was excellent, we were met by someone who worked for the owner who went over every detail. Neighborhood is Palermo Soho, very hip, but not noisy and quite safe. Excellent value for the money. Owner was extremely professional. Can highly recommend.
안전한 지역에 멋있는 아파트였어요. 추천합니다. 교통도 비교적 편리합니다.

Spot on location and accommodations.  You have a view of the world of BsAs from your sofa, balcony and bed.   Best restaurants around the block.  Walk to everything.  No way you could be more comfortable during your visit.

This place is amazing and the tour of the building and welcome items to make our stay more comfortable were fantastic.  Couldn't have picked a better place to stay on our honeymoon.  The view from the condo is beyond belief and the condo is very sleek, comfortable and modern.  Also the walkability for Palermo and quick access to the metro were clutch.

Highly recommend!
Incredible location and views. A good amount of space to relax, work, entertain and sleep. Highly recommend .
Ralf's place was great! In the heart of Buenos Aires's Palermo neighborhood, walking distance to great restaurants.
Great location, safe & super clean. Extra towels, balnket, & pillows would be nice.
An excellent apartment with good access to most things in BA. Ralf met us & was very helpful with all we needed for our 6 night stay. If in BA again, we would definitely use this apartment again.
Excellent location, modern loft and spectacular views! Perfect for our stay in Buenos Aires.

Ralph and his crew are extremely professional and enthusiastic. They were fast to respond and made themselves readily available to help with any needs or issues. They provided their contact info and encouraged us to reach out with any questions. They went out of their way to help me with a complicated package delivery.  11/10 service! ️️️️️ The apartment itself is stunning! Beautifully decorated, clean, crisp, and refreshing. The views of Buenos are breathtaking. We had a very comfortable and luxurious experience. Very safe neighborhood, great for nighttime strolling. Short walk away from a fantastic boutique/restaurant area. Lots of places around to sit down and grab a beer or a meal. Fast walk to the metro (Ralph provides a metro/"sube" card to make travel easy) which will take you to picturesque neighborhoods like San Telmo. Nothing beats nighttime walks around Palermo Soho. Loved the neighborhood and apartment, will definitely visit again.
everything perfect :)
Great location.  Super efficient management. Nice touches on arrival like fruit, coffee and milk.  Very secure.  Also very flexible and accomodating on departure.  Highly recommended

A fantastic apartment to use as a base in BA.
Clean well equipped and brilliant location for all the cool places in Palermo and around town. The arrival was expertly dealt with including really smart advice on the locality and getting around. Spectacular views and very safe location. I will return for sure.

Best Airbnb we have ever stayed at. Excellent communication and help when we arrived, they cordinated drivers for us, reserved a tango show, and were so helpful. Beautiful place and very clean. Location was perfect.
A great apartment for exploring Buenos Aires! The place was exactly as described, and the owners were incredibly helpful and thoughtful. We loved the neighborhood and hope to come back soon.

Ralf was an amazing host and met us as we arrived, so that we wouldn't need to delay the start of our trip.  He took time to review everything about the unit, the neighborhood, and gave us tips about all of the sites we wanted to see.  

The apartment was as nice as it appears in pictures and was very comfortable for two people.  The building is very secure.  You'll receive a small key fob that you buzz at the gate.  The guard will make sure you match the picture and then will allow you in.  Once inside, it is very quiet and secure.  Outside, we found it to be a quiet, safe, residential area.  There is access to the metro line 2 blocks away and plenty of restaurants within walking distance.

Another bonus is that Ralf passed us a subte card with credits already on it.  He passes it from group to group and each person adds money to it.  This is a great way to get you started and makes sure you always have plenty of credits available.

I highly recommend this apartment if you can get it.  I can't think of any negatives.  Just book it, enjoy your trip, and thank me later...  ☺️

Could not have found a better place to stay in Buenos Aires. Once we arrived, Ralf and his crew did an amazing job of introducing us to the apartment and surrounds.  We even got a little seminar on ways of the Portenos! The apartment itself was perfect, with a stunning view and great location. If you're lucky enough to visit this amazing city, I highly recommend staying here.

Ralf and his team were amazing! Everything from the pickup at the airport, to checking in, and providing us a place to stay after our checkout happened seamlessly. His team provided us a great deal of information regarding BsAs and the things we should see/do/eat as well. 

The apartment itself is great. It's a huge airy space, but also very homely. We had everything we needed in the apartment, and the location in Soho was great!

We would happily stay here again!

Communication was great!! We had many questions and Ralf got back to us immediatey on everything! He is very professional and very helpful! The apt was just like the photos! We had an enjoyable vacation! Would recommend to everyone!

Amazing loft in an absolutely prime location of the city. The apartment really looks like the photos!! My boyfriend and I had an amazing time together in Buenos, and this place definitely played a part. 

The apartment is modern, comfortable, and sleek. The bed is extremely comfortable, and we especially enjoyed the view of the city while sitting on the balcony. In addition, the spa access on the 32nd floor is an absolutely stellar amenity.

Beyond the apartment, Ralf was very accommodating throughout the whole process, as were Marcelo and Sandra who helped coordinate. We used the driver service which was very easy, punctual, and economically reasonable.

Very very happy with my experience here, 10/10 recommend!
Had a great stay at the apartment! Views and amenities are just as beautiful as pictured. Very helpful host, able to help with any questions and needs.

We were checked in very efficiently in excellent English and given lots of useful information about the area and BA in general. The apartment itself is amazing, very comfortable, well equipped and with great views. Very central to lots of cafes, restaurants and supermarkets, and just a few minutes away from the metro. Recommended.

We loved our stay in Ralf's apartment. The apartment was lovely, was exactly like the pictures. The location was great, super close to Plaza Italia Subway station.
Check in was a breeze and we were shown around really well and given all the info we needed.
We needed to check out late so they allowed us access to another apartment in the building which was a really nice finish to our stay.
We would definitely stay here again!
The only thing I'd say is if you are sensitive to the light when you sleep then bring an eye mask as the blinds don't totally block out the light.

Fantastic locations and great amenities.  We decided to use the car service through Ralf to ease our arrival. It worked out great.  When we arrived at the condo, we were met by a member of Ralf's team, Marcello.  He did an excellent job of touring us around the building and the unit.  They also provided a notebook that had tons of great information about the area.  It was also handy to have Laundry available in the basement.  And I enjoyed using the sauna and the Pilates reformer machine in the gym.  We would definitely stay at this location again.  We even enjoyed cooking in a couple of nights, and then relaxing with a great bottle or two of Argentina wine as we sat on the deck.

The apartment block is located very close to great restaurants, shopping and is in a very safe area.  The apartment itself is also exactly as how it's depicted in the pictures.  Ralf and his team has definitely thought through all the details in accommodating his guests so our experience from booking to checking out has been seamless and comfortable. Highly recommend staying here if you are staying in Palermo, BA.

Ralf is THE prefect host. Our experience in Buenos Aires was great in big part because of his professionalism, attention to detail and his eagerness to make us feel at home.

The place location can't be better, it is close to all: transportation, restaurants, places of interest, everything you might want and need to explore the city while felling safe and comfortable. The apartment is immaculate, beautiful decorated and with an awesome view of the city.

We highly recommend Ralf and his team in Buenos Aires. They are definitely the "go to" team if you want to live a great Buenos Aires experience. 

Rene and Iris,
NYC
Ótimo apto. Vista maravilhosa! Localização perfeita, tem tudo pertinho e acesso fácil ao subite (metro) Atendimento do anfitrião nota 10.
Beautiful loft with spectacular views, great area, professional hosts, what else could one ask for. Highly recommended

Right from the very beginning we loved the apartment, the neighbourhood and Ralf. 

The view is incredible. The apartment so well appointed that you don't need anything. A perfect place to stay for a couple visiting Buenos Aires.  

It's a great neighbourhood to explore, with a few great things close by and even more if you explore a little wider.

Ralf and Marcelo we so helpful with all of our queries and letting us know about everything in the neighbourhood and helping solve a few travel woes.

My husband and I stayed here for a month, and it was perfect in so many ways. 

First, location: It's two blocks from a metro station, and just a few blocks the other way you'll find more bars, restaurants, and shops than you can possibly visit. The neighborhood is lively enough to be fun, but residential enough to be safe and peaceful. There's hardly any noise up on the 25th floor! It's a city, so groceries are divided among produce stores, liquor stores, and dry goods, but all of these are within a block or two. 

Second, amenities: The apartment is exactly the way it looks in the pictures, with a jaw-dropping view. You have cable television, laundry in the building, a security gate, a gym, and even a 31st floor hot tub. The bed is very comfortable, and the shower always has hot water (neither of these are givens in South America!). 

Finally, service: Everyone at the rental company is friendly and easy to deal with. Marcelo gave us an extensive tour when we arrived, and the people in the office were great over the phone when we had questions. (The only thing is that they give you a lot of warnings about how to be safe in the city, which put us on edge at first. Don't be alarmed! We stayed for a month and never had a hint of anything suspicious happen.)

We would definitely stay again, and/or recommend to a friend.

Ein Zuhause in der Ferne! Eine super schöne Wohnung mit einer Aussicht die einfach unglaublich ist. Nach 4 Monaten reisen und Mehrbettzimmer der PERFEKTE Ort für die letzten Tage. Herzlichen Dank für den Willkommensgruss und alles. Ihr werded eine Buchung für diese Wohnung nicht bereuen!
Fantastic location, huge and spacious, very well organised airbnb host. All the amenity you need. There was a minor issue with noise that was addressed. I would recommend this to my friends.

We've had a wonderful time and feel like we've stayed at a perfect location. Sunday night we found ourselves in a taxi on the way back to Palermo Uno and realized we were out of cash. The driver stopped at many banks, but no machines had any cash to dispense. We were embarrassed of the situation naturally. One of the security guards here at Palermo Uno loaned us the cab fair til the next day. It was very gracious and consistent with the treatment we've experienced here in BA.

I had the pleasure of staying at the Soho Grand Loft for five nights.  My travel partner and I arrived after a overnight flight from Dallas, Texas.  Although standard check-in time is in the afternoon -- I believe 3PM -- the host company, BA4U, allowed us to check in early.  This was much appreciated, as the 10-1/2 hour flight was rather exhausting.  We were greeted at the Loft by Marcelo, a team member of BA4U.  Marcelo was very gracious and helpful.  Not only did he explain in detail how the lights, appliances, and other devices inside the Loft operate, he gave us a "crash course" in the "do's and dont's" of visiting Buenos Aires (BA).  This was very helpful, as it was our first time visiting BA.  Marcelo's main objective was making sure we remained safe in the city.  It was a unexpected bonus from our welcoming host.  

The 32-floor building was fantastic.  It looks like a creation by the world-famous design company Arquitectonica.  Perhaps it is.  There is a gym on the 31st floor with a all-glass panoramic view of the city.  Two hot tubs -- one on either side of the building -- and a sauna are on the 32nd floor.  The hot tubs also look out to the city.  There is a balcony outside our loft with a small table and 2 chairs, which overlooks the vast and dense city below.  Each morning we would enjoy a peaceful breakfast on the balcony, complete with a glass of native Malbec wine.

The customer service from the BA4U team was exemplary.  There was a short, temporary outage of the internet service, and another team member of BA4U, Ralf, showed up at our door to apologize for the inconvenience, and said the issue was already being addressed.  Within 15 minutes the service was back up and running.  Ralf stopped by the condo once again to make sure everything was okay, and told us not to hesitate to contact him or any of the other team members of BA4U should any other needs arise.  

I thoroughly enjoyed the stay in "my home away from home", and when I visit BA again, I will for certain look to see if this same loft is available.

Wir hatten das Apartment für fast vier Wochen gemietet und es hat sich wirklich gelohnt. Die Lage ist sehr gut, Palermo bietet sehr viele Restaurants und Bars. Das Stadtzentrum ist schnell mit der U-Bahn erreichbar und die Station nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt. Obwohl Palermo meines Erachtens zu den sehr sichereren Stadtvierteln gehört, hat das Palermo Uno Gebäude einen 24 Stunden Wachdienst. 

Das Apartment selbst ist perfekt ausgestattet und sieht auch heute noch wie auf den Fotos aus. Der Blick aus dem 25. Stockwerk ist grandios. (Kleiner Tipp: Wenn man einen Drink auf dem Balkon genießt, die beiden Klimaanlagen ausschalten dann wird auch keine warme Luft auf den Balkon geblasen).

Der Check In war problemlos und schnell. Und wenn mal etwas zu klären war, war das Team um Andres und Marcelo stets erreichbar.

Das Apartment wird wöchentlich gereinigt und die mehr als ausreichende Anzahl der Handtücher wird ausgetauscht.

Der Pool eignet sich sehr gut, um ein paar Bahnen zu schwimmen. Das Fitnessstudio ist bietet einen noch besseren Blick über die Stadt und ist mit modernen Geräten ausgestattet.

Bei Ankunft am internationalen Flughafen würden wir wieder den angebotenen Transfer buchen. Das ist sehr komfortabel.

Insgesamt haben wir den Aufenthalt im Soho Grand Loft sehr genossen und würden das Apartment uneingeschränkt weiter empfehlen.
Exceptional apartment in a great part of town.  Building safe, secure, with all imaginable  amenities
Amazing property with majestic views. The bed and pillows aren't your typical Airbnb quality either - much better!  They even left us some snacks upon our arrival.

Amazing apartment with professional service in safe neighbourhood.
La Carnicería around the corner is a obligatory place for steak lovers.
Thank you Ralf.

This is a gorgeous apartment and looks amazing. The location is in the heart of Palermo. The check in process was very smooth and Marcelo explained every detail about the apartment very patiently. We did face some issues - a lot of light enters the apartment and the curtains are not enough to stop this. Also the balcony has the AC back units and hence is always hot and you can't sit and enjoy the balcony with the hot air blowing on you. And because there are only 2 Ac units in the apartment, the room on top does not cool well. The sofa cum bed was not comfortable and in the end we placed the mattress on the floor for the 3rd person. The washer and dryer are not in the apartment and you have to get the keys from the security guys and use only 1 machine at a time with exact change in pesos. 

Even with these issues, we did enjoy our stay .

Ralf and his team made my husband and I feel so welcome in the apartment. Upon arrival, we were greeted and taken on a tour of the unit and the building. Even before arriving, we corresponded regularly and all of our questions were answered in a timely manner. Ralf and his team went above and beyond what's asked - first, they bought us champagne and chocolates for the apartment, as they knew it was our anniversary! Secondly, we didn't exchange any money prior to our arrival, so they gave exchanged money with us out of their own pocket. Can't say enough great things about this place or its owners.

We rented out Ralf's flat for 8 days and found it a great experience. Ralf was friendly and very helpful. The flat looks exactly like on the pictures and the view from the balcony is incredible. The flat is also very well located in BA which is very convenient. I would not hesitate to book through Ralf and his team again in the future.

Great communication from start to finish. The apartment was exactly as described - possibly better even! - with a very helpful & thorough welcome. Location was great. We absolutely loved everything about this place & Ralf & his team made us feel very at home in what was a new city for us! Transfer from the airport was offered & was prompt although a little pricey we learnt compared to just taking a normal taxi we learnt after. The service was great though, & we were happy to pay  a bit more to be looked after more in a new city!

Beautiful apartment in a great location. Secure building, great views. Very clean. Apartment is as pictured. welcoming fruit and water was a nice touch. Excellent management by Ralph and his associates. Quick response to any requests.

What an amazing time!! Ralf and his crew we're extremely accommodating... more than any 5star in town. We we're shown around the apartment upon arrival and felt very looked after. 

The apartment was beautiful - just like the photos. Amazing views in a fantastic area. I would highly recommend!

Excellent communication and appartment. 

The meet and greet was very helpful and helped us to quickly establish our bearings for the area, the restaurant recommendations are spot on as many of them we had on our list to visit. 

This is definielty the area to stay in for Buenos Aires if you want a safe area to roam around, for food and shopping. Very good location and apartment is exactly like the photos. It was a pleasure staying here. 

Adios from London.

This apartment is really as good as the pictures make it out to be! The whole place is a beautiful two story loft with an incredible view of the city. The apartment is in a beautiful secure new high rise that feels very safe and posh. The host, Marcelo, met us when we arrived and was EXTREMELY helpful and friendly. 

The apartment is a short 10-15 minute walk to the center of Palermo SoHo, and even though it is not right in the center of the neighborhood it is located very close to the subway stop making it easy to get to the center of Buenos Aires quickly. 

In short the apartment is beautiful, the host was very friendly, and we had an amazing time. Would absolutely recommend this apartment.
The listing description was definitely accurate and the location is wonderful. We could not get over the amazing view of the city from the 25th floor!

Most other reviews here have been very accurate: Great neighborhood, pretty and comfortable apartment, amazing views! We had a splendid time. My tip would be that if you use the jacuzzi, try to do it during 'off peak' hours.  We went up one evening, and were slightly disappointed and inconvenienced to find there was not enough hot water left in the tank to fill the tub.  Also, if you plan to do laundry in the building, pay close attention to the instructions. In fact, I would encourage you to ask your host to walk you through the process at check in time. The staff was communicative, attentive and flexible about check-in and check-out times. Overall wonderful experience!

I have stayed several times in Ralf's apartments. His team is top notch and everything was perfect from the arrival transfer airport service to the easy check in at the apartment. As an added touch, there are breakfast snacks and fruit provided for the stay. I highly recommend any of Ralf's apartments for a delightful experience in Buenos Aires.

Top spot to stay in Buenos Aires! The location is perfect and the apartment is a little slice of heaven. After travelling through South America and Central America and staying in hostels and home stays, staying at this apartment was the perfect treat and the best way to finish out holiday. We were met by one of the friendly staff who gave us a rundown of the apartment and how things work. There were information folders and magazines about Buenos Aires including things to do, places to eat, where to do laundry etc. There was also a bowl of fresh fruit at the apartment. The gym on the 31st floor has beautiful views and there's spas and saunas on the 32nd floor although we didn't use the spas and saunas. Beautiful pool that's opened in the warmer months. The building has 24/7 security guards who let you in and out of the building so it's 100% safe and secure. We loved Palermo Soho and walked to restaurants, bars, the subway and more. If you want to treat yourself and relax in Buenos Aires then this apartment is the perfect place for you! We couldn't fault it.

This was an outstanding first experience in Buenos Aires.  The apartment is just as the photos depict, if not better!  The views of Palermo are incredible from the 25th floor, and sitting out on the balcony early mornings or late evenings you are afforded a serenity that is unparalleled.

Marcelo was above and beyond the absolute best host I have ever worked with.  He took the time to outline the amenities of the apartment, local restaurants, subway and taxi dos/donts, where to change my money and where to do my laundry.  Additionally, he made himself quite accessible via phone or text throughout my stay for any questions or concerns.

Upon arrival my apartment was not yet ready (as I was early).  Marcelo set me up in a different unit while my unit was prepared.  On entering my unit, Marcelo's team had a bottle of wine and a bowl of fruit to greet me.  This warm and gracious greeting became indicative of the entire experience.  

The experience was so beyond my expectations, that on my return to Buenos Aires (and the city is by itself breathtaking to want to return) I would absolutely look to schedule my stay around the availability of this unit.

Thank you Marcelo and team for creating the base of an incredible Buenos Aires experience!
This place is amazing! The pictures don't do it justice till you actually get there to see it. Marcelo was a tremendous help and flexible checkout was a great help. Would definitely stay here again.

We couldn't have been happier with our decision to stay at the Soho Grand Loft in Palermo.  I arrived to the apartment and was greeted by a member of Ralf's team, who was very helpful in getting me acquainted with everything I would need to know about the apartment.  He spoke very good English which calmed my nerves because my Spanish is quite rusty!  The apartment was exactly as advertised - chic, spacious with amazing views (even with less than ideal weather).  We felt very safe staying there and the security guards were all very welcoming.  The Soho Grand Loft is in a great location, super close to the Subte.  We also had some absolutely amazing meals in Palermo, all in walking distance.  This may have been mentioned in the listing but the apartment came equipped with a blow dryer, iron and ironing board as well as a universal power strip.  All items that were very useful to us!  This is definitely a place we would stay again and would recommend to friends and family.  We were pretty self sufficient during our trip but I have no doubt Ralf and his staff would have been more than accommodating if we needed suggestions throughout our stay.

By far the best and most professional Airbnb experience we've had on any continent. Marcelo took the time to explain everything about the apartment and its amenities (gym, sauna, hot tub), the neighborhood (restaurants, pharmacies, groceries) and transit (subway, taxis, airport shuttles). The apartment is well-equipped and comfortably furnished, clean, and secure. The 25th floor location provided astounding views of Palermo as well as surprising serenity high above the noise of the city. Our stay here has influenced us to schedule our return to Buenos Aires around this apartment's availability alone.

Very nice apartment in the heart of Buenos Aires.  The apartment was as advertised, and overall was a very comfortable place to stay.  Ralf and his team were very professional and responsive.

Overall, it was a great experience.  Highlights are the central location in Palermo, and the great views of the city, especially from the rooftop gym.

I'll definitely stay there again when I'm back in town.  

Thanks, 
David C
Seattle, WA
